article.title: URS Receives Nearly $100 Million for Motion Detection Kits
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: URS, Germantown, Maryland, was awarded a $99,199,868 firm-fixed-price, indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract for the procurement of lighting kit motion detector systems. The U.S. Army Contracting Command, Natick, Massachusetts, is the contracting activity.
